segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let's talk about your name details. Can you tell me your full name, please? Like, your first and last names?  Maybe middle names too if you want.
segments.client_message: Yeah, sure! I'm, uh, actually Evan McCarthy. A-and I think I don’t really have any middle names, just Evan and McCarthy, ya know?  Oh, but, I used to go by Ev most of the time, if that helps.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Evan McCarthy. That's helpful. Now, um, do you have a title you prefer, like Mr. or something? And how about a date of birth?
segments.client_message: Ohhh, you know what? I just remembered! I used to think I liked Mr., but I kinda want you to use just my name, like no titles. And my DOB is 12-06-1985, I was born in Boston, Mass.
